pages.text: When bound to a Judgment Poppet, any unholy being that attacks you will find their attack damage quartered.$(br2)This includes undead mobs, $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demons$() of all kinds, $(l:bewitchment:creatures/vampire)Vampires$(), and $(l:bewitchment:creatures/werewolf)Werewolves$().
